apple_vendor_description: The large green square on Apple devices is a bold and solid geometric shape, boasting a rich, saturated emerald hue. Apple's signature smooth gradients and glossy 3D shading give it a slightly raised, tactile quality, as if it were a perfectly crafted tile. Its soft rounded edges ensure a friendly and approachable aesthetic, making it ideal for conveying concepts related to nature, growth, or simply as a vibrant block of color in digital communication on Apple platforms.

components.description:
A square shown in the color of green. May be used to represent anything green.

May 2021: Sometimes shown in Twitter names in support of Taproot, a Bitcoin fork (potential feature change) that would allow additional privacy measures for transactions.
components.title: Large Green Square

version.description: Unicode 12.0 was released on March 5, 2019. Emojis that require new code points for release are listed on this page. See Emoji 12.0 for the full 2019 emoji list. More about this update.
